name: Zombie Quiz App for the Resident Evil Movies
name_original: Zombie Quiz App for the Resident Evil Movies
description:
The Zombie Quiz App is all about the Resident Evil movies 1-6. That means: This quiz also includes questions regarding Resident Evil: The Final Chapter. The game is a quiz from fans for fans.

Features of the game:
- Questions about the characters
- Insides into the production
- Trivia about the story
- Quotes from the movies
- True and false questions

Challenge your friends via Facebook or Twitter to beat your score.
